General.Name: AS Rigas kugu buvetava
General.Description: AS Rigas kugu buvetava provides ship repair, ship building, and other services in the Baltic region. The company is also involved in the conversion works for various types of vessels, including lengthening, modernization, and refurbishment; and production of steel, stainless steel, and aluminum products. It also engages in renting and operating owned or leased real estate properties. AS Rigas kugu buvetava was founded in 1913 and is based in Riga, Latvia.
